Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui

Class Printer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.Printer
public class Printer extends Object
The Printer class provides functionality for printing messages and game display.

      public Printer()
      default constructor of Printer class.

  • Method Details

    • showBookshelves

      public void showBookshelves(List<Player> players)
      Displays the bookshelves of the given players in a tabular format.
      Parameters:
      players - an ArrayList of Player objects whose bookshelves are to be shown

    • displayPrompt

      public void displayPrompt()
      Displays a prompt for user input. The prompt is represented by ">>>".

    • showNewPlayerInLobby

      public void showNewPlayerInLobby(ArrayList<String> allPlayersUsernames, String content)
      Displays a message indicating a new player has joined the lobby, along with the updated list of all players' usernames.
      Parameters:
      allPlayersUsernames - the list of all players' usernames in the lobby.
      content - the content of the message indicating a new player has joined.

    • showPlayerRejoined

      public void showPlayerRejoined(String username)
      Displays a message indicating that a player has reconnected to the game.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player who has reconnected.

    • showExitGameResponse

      public void showExitGameResponse(String content)
      Displays the response message after a player exits the game.
      Parameters:
      content - the content of the response message.

    • showPlayerLeft

      public void showPlayerLeft(String content)
      Displays a message indicating that a player has left the game.
      Parameters:
      content - the content of the message indicating a player has left.

    • showPersonalGoalCard

      public void showPersonalGoalCard(ItemType[][] personalObjective)
      Displays the personal goal card of the player.
      Parameters:
      personalObjective - the 2D array representing the personal goal card.

    • showReconnection

      public void showReconnection(GameView model, String content, PersonalGoalCard personalGoal)
      Displays the reconnection summary after a player has reconnected to the game.
      Parameters:
      model - the GameView object representing the current state of the game.
      content - the content of the reconnection message.
      personalGoal - the PersonalGoalCard object representing the personal goal of the reconnected player.

    • printChatMessage

      public void printChatMessage(ChatMessage message)
      Prints a chat message to the console.
      Parameters:
      message - the ChatMessage object representing the chat message to be printed.

    • printChat

      public void printChat(ArrayList<ChatMessage> chat)
      Prints the game chat messages to the console.
      Parameters:
      chat - the list of ChatMessage objects representing the chat messages to be printed.
